definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Late Mesozioc Large-scale Intra-continental Rotation and Cratonic Destruction of the North China Block.
sentences.chinese: 华北地块晚中生代大规模陆内旋转与克拉通破坏。

sentences.english: The pericratonic uplifts tend to act as the tectonic barriers.
sentences.chinese: 而克拉通边缘隆起则具有构造障壁的作用。

sentences.english: Therefore the author Proposed the concept of Hainan Craton.
sentences.chinese: 因而提出了海南克拉通的概念。

sentences.english: Late Precambrian mafic dyke swarms are extensively developed in the central North China Craton.
sentences.chinese: 华北克拉通中部广泛发育晚前寒武纪镁铁质岩墙群。

sentences.english: The basin between orogenic belt and craton is called foreland basin.
sentences.chinese: 造山带和克拉通之间的盆地称之为前陆盆地。

sentences.english: The Lower Yangtze Region consists of the rigid nuclear area of the South Yellow Seaand the cratonic peripheral belt.
sentences.chinese: 下扬子区由南黄海刚性陆核及其克拉通周边地带组成。

sentences.english: A commonly cited example of a craton is the Canadian Shield.
sentences.chinese: 通常引用的克拉通实例是加拿大地盾。

sentences.english: In the Triassic period, following the collision between North-China and South-China cratons, the Tanlu fault zone was formed.
sentences.chinese: 三叠纪，华南与华北克拉通碰撞，郯庐断裂带形成。

definition: collisional orogeny/mountain building as a result of continents colliding
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)
